AI-powered answer sheet scoring

Welcome to Iskorly 
 • Fill in Student, Subgroup 1 (Section), and Subgroup 2 (Subject/Quiz).
 • Tap Start Scan or Import Photos to scan answer sheets.
 • Camera: Align the answer sheet and tap Scan. After capture, crop the image to focus on answers, then confirm.
 • Import Photos: Select one or multiple images from gallery for batch processing.
 • A popup will show the parsed answers filtered to your answer key. Tap any value to edit if needed.
 • Tap Confirm & Score to see your score, then tap Save to store it in History.
 • Tap Scan Again to close the popup and return to the camera.
 
 Setup Answer Key:
 • Setup Answer Key to manage multiple quizzes (Slots: New/Rename/Delete/Import/Export).
 • Add answers: enter Question # and Answer (A–Z or short text up to 40 chars) → Save.
 
 History & Analysis:
 • History: Expand by Quiz and Section to view results.
 • Export CSV for sharing.
 • Masterlist: See per-question performance and common wrong answers.
 
 Tips:
 • Good lighting, flat sheet, steady frame.
 • For handwriting: dark pen, avoid shadows, crop tightly.
 • Review parsed answers before confirming.
